review: Small and compact , easy to travel with. Perfect for any type of smartphone and is fun to use. Great for Netflix and other apps but also you can mirror chrome.browser to TV.
author: HelloFallAllergies

review: Only works 75 % of the time, get a roku, I did and we're very happy now
author: Charles Tannenbaum

review: work well my kids are on Netflix all the time.
author: Lorena Lozano

review: I'm very dissapoint with this product cause I have an Ipad and I can't cast vídeos from The web. I only can cast vídeos to my tv from te App like Netflix, YouTube and Google play. I tried to download different Apps to cast inline vídeos but non of it supports vídeos format.
author: Valerie

review: Works well. If YouTube, Netflix and posting web pages is all you need then this works perfect for it. The installation process was easy. For the price this is a no brainer, best deal on the web!
author: EgoTrader "egotrader"
